params.name: 执行 Python 脚本
params.code:
import pyautogui
import numpy as np
import cv2

img = np.array(pyautogui.screenshot())
new_img, threshold = drawRectangle(img, r"work/work_images/IMAGE_2024-12-03-195421.png")
if new_img is not None:
    cv2.imwrite("temp_result.png", new_img)
    print("匹配成功,结果保存在 temp_result.png 中,匹配度为:", threshold)
else:
    print("匹配失败，置信度为",threshold)
